page.title: 05THE POLICE
page.content: BILLINGHAY'S VILLAGE POLICEMAN IS PC GUTHRIE.EVERY POLICEMAN HAS A NUMBER ON HIS SHOULDER TO HELP IDENTIFY HIM. THE AVERAGE NUMBER OF JOBS A POLICEMAN HAS TO DO IN A WEEK IS 20 TO 25.IN A MONTH IT IS 80 TO 100 JOBS.PC GUTHRIE COVERS 9 VILLAGES OVER AN AREA OF 100 SQUARE MILES.HIS MAIN DUTIES ARE PROTECTION OF LIFE AND PROPERTY,DETECTION OF OFFENDERS, PREVENTION OF CRIME AND MAINTAINING THE PEACE. PC GUTHRIE USUALLY GOES AROUND IN A CAR SO IT WILL BE FASTER.BUT HE HAS TO STOP TO TALK TO PEOPLE.THE BIGGEST EMERGENCY PC GUTHRIE HAS EVER BEEN INVOLVED IN WAS A MILITARY PLANE CRASH AFTER THE PILOT HAD EJECTED ON THE OUTSKIRTS OF BILLINGHAY.PC GUTHRIE ALSO ATTENDS EVERY PARISH COUNCIL MEETING IN ALL 9 VILLAGES.
